price: 72. Dheh: Waa intaasoo ay yihiin wax dhow oo gadaashiinna ah qaar ka mid ah waxaad rabtaan in la soo dedjiyo (Cadaabka).
arabic: قُلۡ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعۡضُ ٱلَّذِي تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul ʿasā an yakūna radifa lakum baʿḍu alladhī tastaʿjilūna
